alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Goshen County through 215 PM MDT... At 144 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Jay Em, or 26 miles south of Lusk, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jay Em and Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
